main event: Mr. and Mrs. of Waco, Texas, observed several groups of strange lights in the sky while driving from Port Worth to Waco on 5 January 1951.
interesting points: The lights were observed at an altitude of 1000 feet., The sighting occurred at approximately 10:42 P.M., The lights increased in size and intensity as they approached., Two additional lights appeared and merged with the existing lights., The report suggests that the observed objects may have been mistaken for a balloon.
sighted object: groups of strange lights in the sky
witness description: a couple driving from Port Worth to Waco
